mapper.update: update tbl_usercard set uc_UserId=#{ucUserId} where pk_UserCard=#{pkUserCard}
update tbl_user_normal set apply_card=2 where user_id=#{ucUserId}

update tbl_usercard set uc_Status=#{ucStatus}, uc_InternalCardNumber=#{ucInternalCardNumber}, uc_ExternalCardNumber=#{ucExternalCardNumber}, uc_Balance=#{ucBalance}, uc_CompanyNumber=#{ucCompanyNumber}, uc_UserId=#{ucUserId}, uc_Updatedate=sysdate() where pk_UserCard=#{pkUserCard}
mapper.select: SELECT u.norm_real_name normRealName, u.user_account userAccount, c.cpy_CompanyName cpyCompanyname, t.* FROM tbl_usercard t left join tbl_user_normal_view u on t.uc_UserId=u.user_id left join tbl_company c on t.uc_CompanyNumber=c.cpy_CompanyNumber and c.cpy_CompanyNumber > 0 where 1=1 and u.norm_real_name like concat('%',#{normRealName},'%') and u.user_account like concat('%',#{userAccount},'%') and t.uc_ExternalCardNumber like concat('%',#{ucExternalCardNumber},'%') and c.cpy_CompanyName like concat('%',#{cpyCompanyname},'%') and t.uc_Status=#{ucStatus} and t.uc_pay_mode = #{ucPayMode} and t.uc_UserId!=0 and t.uc_UserId=0 order by uc_UserId asc,uc_Updatedate desc limit #{pager.offset},#{pager.numPerPage}
